# Pull request

Please describe the change and include relevant context (screenshots, steps to reproduce, links).

Checklist
- [ ] I ran `npm run lint` locally and fixed issues
- [ ] I ran `npx tsc --noEmit` and fixed type errors
- [ ] I ran `npm run build` successfully
- [ ] I added/updated tests when applicable

Notes:
- If this PR touches data/model changes, please add migration notes.
